ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will have the Abyss for abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: his shall be the deep pit for a dwelling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: will have hawiyah as their dwelling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is in the lap of one that abases.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: His abode shall be the abyss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: shall plunge in the womb of the Pit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A bereft and Hungry One will be his mother,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the Abyss shall be his home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: His dwelling shall be the Abyss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: his home will be the Abyss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Will have his home in a (bottomless) Pit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will have his home in Hawiyah (pit, i.e. Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: his head will be in the Plunging
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: His refuge will be an abyss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [101:9]   his home will be the Abyss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The Bereft and Hungry One will be his mother) his abode and destination will be the Fire; it is also said this 770 means: he will be thrown in the Fire.
